subject: Question about MAPE
body: Hi, I got admitted to Cal Poly and I'm not sure if I need to take the MAPE. Can you help?

subject: AP Calc confusion
body: I took AP Calculus AB and got a 2. Do I still need to take the math placement test?

subject: General enrollment
body: Do you know when enrollment opens for fall classes?

subject: MAPE location
body: Where do I take the MAPE if I'm out of state?
